page.title: 03THE MOTORWAY
page.content: There is going to be a motorway past our village.The M40 will run from Warwick to Oxford.It is going to help people travel more easily,but it will spoil a lot of the countryside.It will speed up the traffic but I think it should not be built.It is going though a quiet country lane that I like to walk along.To build it they would have to knock down a lot of barns and old buildings and it will ruin the habitats of much of the wildlife. It will go though a lot of farm land but farmers know how useful it would be.It will probably make the village air polluted and more busy. What was once a quite silent village will turn into a noisy area. Most people inside the village disagree with the motorway but most people outside will find it useful.
